mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, uname, upwd, umonicker, uemail, uphone, uquestion, uanswer, urole, createTime, updateTime) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{umonicker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update user set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upwd = #{upwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, umonicker = #{umonicker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uemail = #{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uphone = #{uphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uquestion = #{uquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uanswer = #{uanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urole = #{urole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, uname, upwd, umonicker, uemail, uphone, uquestion, uanswer, urole, createTime, updateTime from user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select uid, uname, upwd, umonicker, uemail, uphone, uquestion, uanswer, urole, createTime, updateTime from user
